header.title: wxGridBagSizer

description.p: A wxSizer that can lay out items in a virtual grid like a wxFlexGridSizer but in this case explicit positioning of the items is allowed using wxGBPosition (not implemented in wx), and items can optionally span more than one row and/or column using wxGBSpan (not implemented in wx).
This class is derived (and can use functions) from: wxFlexGridSizer wxGridSizer wxSizer
